AccessGrantArn.description: the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified access grant.

S3SubPrefix.description: The S3 sub prefix of a registered location in your S3 Access Grants instance

GranteeIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the Grantee

GranteeType.description: Configures the transfer acceleration state for an Amazon S3 bucket.

description: The AWS::S3::AccessGrant resource is an Amazon S3 resource type representing permissions to a specific S3 bucket or prefix hosted in an S3 Access Grants instance.

AccessGrantArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified access grant.

AccessGrantId.description: The ID assigned to this access grant.

AccessGrantsLocationConfiguration.description: The configuration options of the grant location, which is the S3 path to the data to which you are granting access.

AccessGrantsLocationId.description: The custom S3 location to be accessed by the grantee

ApplicationArn.description: The ARN of the application grantees will use to access the location

GrantScope.description: The S3 path of the data to which you are granting access. It is a combination of the S3 path of the registered location and the subprefix.

Grantee.description: The principal who will be granted permission to access S3.

Permission.description: The level of access to be afforded to the grantee
